thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Fernando Pereira (The FocusOn Group, Inc.
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Fernando Pereira (The FocusOn Group, Inc.

author: Fernando Pereira (The FocusOn Group, Inc.
title: Fernando Pereira (The FocusOn Group, Inc.
text: The turn around from beginning to getting our order finalized was fast, and extremely easy. Sophia went above and beyond to ensure that our order was not only correct, but that the product we chose met our needs. Would not hesitate to deal with again.
